ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mon1pldg.d | |- D = ( deg1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | mon1pldg.o | |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | mon1pldg.m | |- M = ( Monic1p ` R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Poly1 ` R ) = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) = ( Base ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) = ( 0g ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 5, 6, 1, 3, 2 | #P_ismon1p | |- ( F e. M <-> ( F e. ( Base ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) /\ F =/= ( 0g ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) /\ ( ( coe1 ` F ) ` ( D ` F ) ) = .1. ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_simp3bi | |- ( F e. M -> ( ( coe1 ` F ) ` ( D ` F ) ) = .1. ) |
